item.title: New online Stan coding course
item.description: Hey everyone! I’m excited to announce my new online course for learning direct Stan coding for Bayesian analysis. Available now; enroll here: https://athlyticz.com/stan-i. — TL;DR — Actual Stan coding, not a high-level interface At-your-own-pace videos: shows live coding while explaining Hosted RStudio session to practice alongside me Starts with fundamentals, builds to hierarchical models Emphasizes a Bayesian workflow Modeling applied to sports data My goal is to make learning Stan as easy and fast as possible.
